original: @239b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @239b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i tsakra samba ra sto tra:/
analyzed: shr'i tsakra samba ra sto tra:/
translated: Śrīcakraśambarastotra

original: bod skad du /🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Praise of the Glorious Wheel of Chakrasamvara

original: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Chakrasamvara!

original: zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad cing //
analyzed: zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad cing //
translated: You conquer hatred through the means of hatred,

original: chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes ngo bo nyid //
translated: the essence of the wisdom of the pure sphere of reality,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam par sbyor //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam par sbyor //
translated: united with the Vajra dakini.

original: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: To you, Hatred Vajra, I pay homage!🔽Arisen from the path of the vajra HŪṂ, the color of a rain cloud,

original: h'um gi rdo rje lam byung char sprin mdog / dga' ba rnam dag drag po'i zhal bzhir snang //
analyzed: h'um gi rdo rje lam byung char sprin mdog / dga' ba rnam dag drag po'i zhal bzhir snang //
translated: the pure joy appearing as the four faces of Rudra,

original: gar gyi nyams dgus gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa //
analyzed: gar gyi nyams dgus gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa //
translated: taming the difficult to tame with the nine expressions of dance,

original: h'um mdzad rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: h'um mdzad rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: to you, HŪṂ-maker Vajra, I pay homage!

original: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas sa rnams rdzogs //
analyzed: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas sa rnams rdzogs //
translated: The twelve links of dependent origination purified, the stages are perfected,

original: bcu gnyis phyag gis phyag mchan sna tshogs 'dzin //
analyzed: bcu gnyis phyag gis phyag mchan sna tshogs 'dzin //
translated: with twelve arms holding various hand implements,

original: yul dang yul can rnam rtog 'joms mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: yul dang yul can rnam rtog 'joms mdzad pa'i //
translated: conquering the concepts of objects and subjects,🔽to you, Vajra of the Twelve Links, I pay homage!

original: ngo mtshang mtshon cha bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽h'um gi nga ros srid gsum skrag mdzad cing //
analyzed: ngo mtshang mtshon cha bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo // h'um gi nga ros srid gsum skrag mdzad cing //
translated: I pay homage to you who hold the weapons of the true nature.🔽With the sound of HŪṃ, you terrify the three worlds,

original: rngam pa'i rkan sgra phat kyi sgra sgrogs pas //
analyzed: rngam pa'i rkan sgra phat kyi sgra sgrogs pas //
translated: And with the sound of Phat, you frighten the haughty ones.

original: bdud dang bgegs tshogs gdul dka' ma lus 'dul //
analyzed: bdud dang bgegs tshogs gdul dka' ma lus 'dul //
translated: You tame all the difficult-to-tame demons and obstructors.

original: rnam rtog bgegs bdud 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rnam rtog bgegs bdud 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you who conquer the demons and obstructors of conceptual thoughts.🔽You are the supreme bliss free from elaborations, the color of ruby,

original: spros bral bde mchog padma r'a ga'i mdog / stong nyid 'od gsal dus gsum bde gshegs blo //
analyzed: spros bral bde mchog padma r'a ga'i mdog / stong nyid 'od gsal dus gsum bde gshegs blo //
translated: The wisdom of the luminous emptiness of the sugatas of the three times,

original: rnam rtog dra ba ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: rnam rtog dra ba ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i //
translated: The one who conquers the entire net of conceptual thoughts.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the mother of the victorious ones of the three times.🔽The pure elements of earth, water, fire, and wind

original: sa chu me rlung 'byung ba rnam par dag / dag pa'i zhal bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang //
analyzed: sa chu me rlung 'byung ba rnam par dag / dag pa'i zhal bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang //
translated: Appear as the four pure faces, the mothers of the families.

original: dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi yi ngo bo nyid ;
analyzed: dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi yi ngo bo nyid ;
translated: You are the essence of the four close mindfulnesses.

original: / mkha' 'gro ma sogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sems kyi rnam rtogs bla'i srid pa sbyong //
analyzed: / mkha' 'gro ma sogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo // sems kyi rnam rtogs bla'i srid pa sbyong //
translated: I pay homage to you, the mother of the ḍākinīs and so forth.🔽You purify the existence of the mind’s conceptual thoughts.

original: zhe sdang rnam dag thugs kyi 'khor lor snang //
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam dag thugs kyi 'khor lor snang //
translated: You appear as the wheel of awakened mind, the purity of anger.

original: thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum ma la sogs //
analyzed: thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum ma la sogs //
translated: Khaṇḍarohā, Caṇḍarohā, and so forth,

original: gnas dang nye gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnas dang nye gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you all, who dwell in the charnel grounds and their vicinity.

original: gsung gi nga ros sa stengs @240a * //🔽srid pa sbyong //
analyzed: gsung gi nga ros sa stengs @240a * // srid pa sbyong //
translated: With the sound of your speech, you purify the existence of the earth.

original: 'dod chags rnam dag gsung gi 'khor lor snang //
analyzed: 'dod chags rnam dag gsung gi 'khor lor snang //
translated: Purified of attachment, you appear as the wheel of speech.

original: myu gu can dang sa srungs ma la sogs //
analyzed: myu gu can dang sa srungs ma la sogs //
translated: Āḍalī, Kṣemalī, and so forth,

original: zhing dang nye zhing rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: zhing dang nye zhing rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you all, who dwell in the buddhafields and their vicinity.

original: sku yi rol pas sa 'og srid pa sbyong //
analyzed: sku yi rol pas sa 'og srid pa sbyong //
translated: With the play of your body, you purify the existence below the earth.

original: gti mug rnam dag sku yi 'khor lor snang //
analyzed: gti mug rnam dag sku yi 'khor lor snang //
translated: Purified of ignorance, you appear as the wheel of body.

original: stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can sogs //
analyzed: stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can sogs //
translated: Mahābala, Cakravegā, and so forth,

original: 'dus sogs gnas la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dus sogs gnas la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you all, who dwell in the gathering places and so forth.

original: yang dag las mtha' 'tsho ba rtsol dran //🔽bde chen dga' ba mos dang gtso la phyogs //🔽gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus srung mdzad pa //🔽sgo bzhi ma mor snang la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: yang dag las mtha' 'tsho ba rtsol dran // bde chen dga' ba mos dang gtso la phyogs // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus srung mdzad pa // sgo bzhi ma mor snang la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,🔽right concentration, right view, and right speech,🔽the four perfect abandonments,🔽the four legs of miraculous action,

original: / brtson 'grus rnam ngag yang dag spong ba bzhi //
analyzed: / brtson 'grus rnam ngag yang dag spong ba bzhi //
translated: the five faculties,🔽the five powers,🔽the seven branches of enlightenment,🔽and the eight branches of the noble path of the āryas—🔽I pay homage to you all, who are the essence of the thirty-seven factors of awakening.🔽The four correct renunciations,

original: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs ma mor snang //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs ma mor snang //
translated: And the mātṛkās, such as Dṛdhā, appear.

original: phyogs gnyis 'dzin pas sku mdog phyed gzugs ma //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis 'dzin pas sku mdog phyed gzugs ma //
translated: She has a half-form, her body half-blue,

original: rgyal ba'i yum du bstan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yum du bstan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Mother of the Victorious Ones.

original: bde gshegs brgyad kyis bstan pa'i snying por bstan //
analyzed: bde gshegs brgyad kyis bstan pa'i snying por bstan //
translated: She is taught to be the essence taught by the eight sugatas,

original: bdag med dkyil 'khor dur khrod brgyad du gnas //
analyzed: bdag med dkyil 'khor dur khrod brgyad du gnas //
translated: Abiding in the eight charnel grounds of the mandala of selflessness,

original: byang chub rkyen du shing brgyad mngon du byung //
analyzed: byang chub rkyen du shing brgyad mngon du byung //
translated: The eight trees manifest as the conditions for enlightenment,

original: 'jig rten chos brgyad bsregs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos brgyad bsregs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who burns the eight worldly dharmas.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the glorious Cakrasaṃvara

original: rgyal po chen po aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rgyal po chen po aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: Composed by the great king Indrabhūti.
